attributes.action: Adhd medication to continue after the child reaches the age of 16
attributes.additional_details: Currently once a child with an adhd diganosis reaches 16 the guidlines say they are to start reducing the dosage of medciation so that when the child reaches 18 they are not on anything, this is causing lots of problems for famlies and the children could see themselves on the wrong side of the law, family breakdown and more, this needs to be reviewed and fast. Please help to support
